statements: SELECT text_content, source, text_id FROM texts WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT source, text_id, text_content FROM texts WHERE text_id = 2;
SELECT text_content, text_id, source FROM texts WHERE text_id = 3;
SELECT text_id, source, text_content FROM texts WHERE text_id = 4;
SELECT source, text_content, text_id FROM texts WHERE text_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM texts WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT source, text_content FROM texts WHERE text_id > 5 ORDER BY text_id DESC;
SELECT text_id, source, text_content FROM texts WHERE source LIKE '%example%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT text_id, text_content FROM texts WHERE text_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR source = 'SQL Examples';
SELECT text_id AS id, source AS src, text_content AS content FROM texts WHERE source != 'Internal' ORDER BY text_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM texts;
SELECT text_source, text_content FROM texts WHERE text_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT text_id, text_source FROM texts WHERE text_source LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM language_models WHERE model_name = 'NLP Model';
SELECT model_id, model_name, trained_text_id FROM language_models ORDER BY model_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM texts WHERE text_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT text_content, text_source FROM texts WHERE text_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT text_id, text_source FROM texts WHERE text_source LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY text_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM language_models WHERE model_name = 'NLP Model' AND model_description ILIKE '%language%';
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM language_models ORDER BY model_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM texts WHERE language_code = 'en';
SELECT text_content FROM texts WHERE source_id = 3;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM sources WHERE source_type = 'news';
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM language_models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT text_content, language_code FROM texts WHERE text_id = 10;

SELECT text_content, language_code FROM texts WHERE source_id = 5
SELECT * FROM sources WHERE source_type = 'Blog' ORDER BY source_name DESC

SELECT model_name, model_type, model_accuracy FROM language_models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8
SELECT * FROM texts;
SELECT text_content, source_name FROM texts;
SELECT text_id, text_content, source_name FROM texts WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, author_bio FROM authors;
SELECT * FROM sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT text_content, source_name FROM texts WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, author_bio FROM authors WHERE author_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM languages WHERE language_name = 'English';
SELECT text_content, source_name FROM texts WHERE text_id > 5 ORDER BY text_id DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_bio FROM authors WHERE author_id <= 10 AND author_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM text_sources;
SELECT source_name FROM text_sources ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT text_content FROM texts WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, model_id FROM models WHERE model_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT log_message FROM train_logs WHERE log_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM text_sources;
SELECT source_name FROM text_sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT model_name, text_content FROM models, texts WHERE models.model_id = 1 AND texts.source_id = 1;
SELECT t.text_id, tl.log_message FROM texts t INNER JOIN model_training mt ON t.text_id = mt.text_id INNER JOIN train_logs tl ON mt.training_id = tl.training_id;

SELECT ts.source_name, m.model_name, t.text_content FROM text_sources ts JOIN texts t ON ts.id = t.source_id JOIN model_training mt ON t.text_id = mt.text_id JOIN models m ON mt.model_id = m.model_id;
